full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 204-5 Filed 04/16/21 Page 1 of 9
P. Skinner 2/29/16
Brad Edwards
Stan Pottinger
A. Kramer (notes)
BE - rep. Virginia Roberts
SP - rep. Virginia
Long history of litigation
BE
First inv. into Jeffrey Epstein was done by Coral Palmer Beach PD (~2005)
rounded up approx. 24 girls related by JE
represented about 10 girls
JE's MO - w/ adults they'd tell 13 yr. old girl 'came to rich guy's house to give paid massage. JE naked - starts as massage & ultimate demand of sex acts (if you want $, do $). After paid 200/300 - then offered 800-300 finders fee. Victims recruited other victims. Mother complained & involved PD.
PD turned case over to FBI & USAP. Most of girls (approx. 40+) in FL. No flight (logs).
Issued CT subpoenas Epstein + 4 named co-conspirators
Entered into a nina plea for state ct. to 2001-2007 prostitution minor & prostitution immunity
fed. pros. for sex crimes comm. in FL btw 2001 - 2007
Jen Lefcourt, Jay Lefkowitz, Ken Starr, Roy Black Epstein
Martin Weinberg, Gary Lewin - never Jem shared (ourselves)
SD FL - at Palm Beach, Mariz Viagra
Limited to FL in plea

additional_notes: The document appears to be a handwritten note related to a court case involving Jeffrey Epstein. The handwriting is mostly legible, but some words are difficult to decipher. The document includes a header with case information and a footer with a document control number.
